oai_dc:dc.dc:title: al- Sāmī fī al-asāmī : manuscript, 1251
Lughat-i Sāmī
Sāmī fī al-asāmī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Maydānī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad , -1124
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Mūqānī, Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad. (scribe.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, from 19 (ff. 1r-92v) to 21 (ff. 93r-114v) lines per page, in black now faded and red.

According to the colophon (f. 115r), copy completed on 17 Jumādá al-Ākhirah 649 AH [September 5, 1251 AD] in Qūnyah [Konya] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muḥammad ibn K.mār (?) al-Mūqānī (?).
Ownership statement on f. 1r: "li-Sayyid Sulaymān al-mudarris bi-Madrasat Ḥamza Bek fī Brūsah."
MS Arab 16. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
